name: Split Paths
description:
Its a nice and cozy autumn and you're in the mood to go for a walk into a forest for your first time since you moved into town. Upon stepping off your car, you notice a maze out of hay and pumpkins blocking your way. This is where the fun begins, but upon finishing your first maze, you run into another obstacle, a split path. In this game as the name suggests, you will be going into a maze of mazes, all with different outcomes. Lets just hope this trip will be a safe one!

Story aside, This is my first time publishing a game, and its for a game jam!

I had lots of fun making this and got some learning experience out of making this game alone! Since I'm new and quite honestly pretty bad at making music, I made an option that lets you mute the music.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys = Move at any direction

R = Reset level in case you messed up at a level

M  = Mute music if it gets too annoying

Esc = Close game (While in Menu )or Head back to Menu to start all over (While Playing)
